action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square. The first row has an X in the first and last positions. The second row has Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions. The third row has Xs in the first, third, and fifth positions. The fourth row has Xs in the first and last positions. The fifth row is identical to the fourth row, with Xs in the first and last positions. The remaining positions are all blank (▢).
continue

This is my DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square. The first row has an X in the first and last positions. The second row has Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions. The third row has Xs in the first, third, and fifth positions. The fourth row has Xs in the first and last positions. QUESTION: In your grid, are the second and fourth rows symmetrical with respect to the vertical axis running down the center of the grid?
